textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live more 02/11/2015 Reserve Brandon Watkins scored a career-high 14 points and No. 21 West Virginia surrendered a double-digit lead before recovering for a 76-72 win over Kansas State on Wednesday night. No. 21 West Virginia Tops K-State 76-72 02/13/2015 The second student charged in the death of a West Virginia University fraternity pledge has turned himself into police. 2nd Student Charged In WVU Student’s Death Turns Self In 02/16/2015 Juwan Staten made a layup with 4 seconds left to lift No. 23 West Virginia to a 62-61 victory over No. 8 Kansas on Monday night. Staten’s Layup Lifts No. 23 WVU Over No. 8 Kansas 62-61
